paper_abstract: The adoption rates of eRx systems continue to be low and their implementation remains uneven. Rooted in the theories of technology-organization alignment and strategy maps, this article develops a framework for successful implementation of eRx systems. The proposed strategy map outlines the key strategic processes that would make implementation of eRx systems not only feasible and successful, but also a profitable venture for healthcare organizations.
paper_title: Successful Implementation of eRx Systems: Creating Technology-Organization Alignment using the Strategy-Map Approach
